description.en: With "Bitly Juice" miner, every hash invokes with the mischievous spirit of Beetlejuice. Just say its name three times and watch as it unleashes a whirlwind of mining power, extracting crypto from the netherworld of digital assets with ghostly precision and a dash of chaos.

description.en: Born from the last frozen shards of the north, awakens with a gentle thaw. Crystals glinting in emerald light as delicate butterflies herald a new dawn of life.
description.cn: The final metamorphosis of a warrior spirit — delicate yet unstoppable. Emerging as a glass-winged phantom, it glides through the blockchain in quiet majesty, gathering hidden fortunes like a reborn queen claiming her rightful treasures.
